genius.core.session

Class InvalidActionError

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • genius.core.session.ActionException
          • genius.core.session.InvalidActionError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InvalidActionError
extends ActionException
    Error that will be thrown when an action that is not valid for the given round. At this moment (September 2014) The SessionManager detects these invalid actions and throws this error.
    See Also:
